body_html: @ymodak . Thanks for the fast reply. Yes, Ioaded Keras with library(keras) and the first command executed well. However, only keras_model_sequential() worked other commands did not. E.g.., the second one I mentioned and also "use_session_with_seed(2018)" did not work. I was not surprised, because Keras seems to require tensorflow="1.10.1" and I used tensorflow="1.10.0" instead, which was kind of a hack.

body: @ymodak . Thanks for the fast reply.  Yes, Ioaded Keras with library(keras) and the first command executed well. However, only keras_model_sequential() worked other commands did not. E.g.., the second one I mentioned and also "use_session_with_seed(2018)" did not work. I was not surprised, because Keras seems to require tensorflow="1.10.1" and I used  tensorflow="1.10.0" instead, which was kind of a hack.
